meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Julie Sandel Doug Trazzare Rich Rosenlof Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4108.

td.p: Julie Sandel, a high school teacher from Dallas, Texas
Doug Trazzare, a market planning manager from Los Angeles, California
Rich Rosenlof, a sales representative from Sacramento, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $37,400)

tr.td: STATE LICENSE PLATES
MUSIC
THE DUCHESS OF WINDSOR
FIRST OF THE MONTH
ARCHAEOLOGY
CELESTIAL QUOTES

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Doug] You are correct although you wrote "Siscorhands". We don\'t penalize you for misspelled words.)
DougWhat was "Edward Siscorhands"?
$988
JulieWhat is Edward Scissorhands?
$7,799
RichWhat is Edward Scissorhands?
$3,000
Edward Scissorhands')
